subject: RE: Google Tracking Code
preview: Hi Alban, Confirming the thank you page has is now active as well:https://rentacentre.com.au/thank-you/

full_threads.body:
Hi Alban, 

Confirming the thank you page has is now active as well:
https://rentacentre.com.au/thank-you/

@heath done adding the thank you page to Rentacentre, kindly check: https://rentacentre.com.au/thank-you/
I've also updated all the enquiry form below to redirect to the Thank you page once submitted:
- Enquiry
- FAQ Enquiry
-Product Rentals Enquiry
- Send Us A Message

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body: Can we please replicate this page: https://rentacentre.kinsta.cloud/thank-you/ <https://rentacentre.kinsta.cloud/thank-you/>  on the live site and make sure that when a contact form is submitted that this page is shown?

Hi Heath,

Thanks. One more thing.

Previously the contact form used a thank you page, which was used as the trigger for conversion. The page seem to have been removed and affect Any chance you could please redirect users to a thank you page (https://rentacentre.com.au/thank-you <https://rentacentre.com.au/thank-you>) when a contact enquiry is made through the form?

Many thanks

Alban

From: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Monday, 29 March 2021 3:13 PM
To: Madeleine Ryan <madeleine@advantagestyling.com.au>
Cc: Dan Gerber <dan@advantagestyling.com.au>; Dan Evans <dan@fullsteamconsulting.com.au>; Alban Guillemot <alban@fullsteamconsulting.com.au>; David Di Veroli <david@rentacentre.com.au>
Subject: Re: Google Tracking Code

Hi Madeleine,

I have now added the pixel ending in 501.

Please note there is another pixel loading on the site, ending with 184. I believe it’s being loaded through the Google Tag Manager account. You may want to remove/disable this to avoid any duplicate issues. Let me know if you need a hand with this.

Thanks,
Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134 <tel:1300%20072%20134>
Mobile: 0415 162 271 <tel:0415%20162%20271>
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>
<https://wolfiq.com.au/>

>>>> On 29 Mar 2021, at 8:48 am, Dan Evans <dan@fullsteamconsulting.com.au <mailto:dan@fullsteamconsulting.com.au>> wrote:
>>>>
>>>> ﻿
>>>> Hi Dan and David,
>>>>
>>>> I hope you are well.
>>>>
>>>> We have detected that the Google Tracking code for the RentaCentre site has been removed, could you please have the following re-added to the site to ensure minimal disruption in tracking and reporting:
>>>>
>>>> Copy the code below and paste it onto every page of your website.
>>>>
>>>> Paste this code as high in the <head> of the page as possible:
>>>>
>>>> <!-- Google Tag Manager -->
>>>> <script>(function(w,d,s,l,i){w[l]=w[l]||[];w[l].push({'gtm.start':
>>>> new Date().getTime(),event:'gtm.js'});var f=d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
>>>> j=d.createElement(s),dl=l!='dataLayer'?'&l='+l:'';j.async=true;j.src=
>>>> 'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id='+i+dl;f.parentNode.insertBefore(j,f) <https://aus01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.googletagmanager.com%2Fgtm.js%3Fid%3D%27%2Bi%2Bdl%3Bf.parentNode.insertBefore(j%2Cf)&data=04%7C01%7Cmadeleine%40advantagestyling.com.au%7C81e606685bbe40b657e008d8f25b7272%7C990eae31a9404d14b2ac18d698fa2459%7C1%7C0%7C637525821927713186%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=i9W6dZL%2BFsfUJ8v9ki6T2jzAQEM5EoXheTm57PvGbGA%3D&reserved=0>;
>>>> })(window,document,'script','dataLayer','GTM-K46TBQ');</script>
>>>> <!-- End Google Tag Manager -->
>>>>
>>>> Additionally, paste this code immediately after the opening <body> tag:
>>>>
>>>> <!-- Google Tag Manager (noscript) -->
>>>> <noscript><iframe src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/ns.html?id=GTM-K46TBQ <https://aus01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.googletagmanager.com%2Fns.html%3Fid%3DGTM-K46TBQ&data=04%7C01%7Cmadeleine%40advantagestyling.com.au%7C81e606685bbe40b657e008d8f25b7272%7C990eae31a9404d14b2ac18d698fa2459%7C1%7C0%7C637525821927723176%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=xr%2BkQ1YinE3OACDgmJZRpHZROwVRsQmo%2BCCHaMSNFKc%3D&reserved=0>"
>>>> height="0" width="0" style="display:none;visibility:hidden"></iframe></noscript>
>>>> <!-- End Google Tag Manager (noscript) -->
>>>>
>>>> If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me.
